menu.name: UI Options
menu.desc: Customize the visibility, position, and scale of interface elements to suit your playstyle or focus on the gameplay.

checkbox.name: Middle Scroll
checkbox.desc: Forces all notes to spawn at screen center.

menu.name: Game Difficulty
menu.desc: Adjust the challenge tier of game rules to balance your skill against the intensity of the experience.

checkbox.name: Mod Chart
checkbox.desc: If you experience severe intermittent stuttering, try disabling this setting.

checkbox.name: Hurt Note
checkbox.desc: Disable all notes in the game that will be penalized when pressed.

menu.name: Shader Quality
menu.desc: You can boost your FPS by lowering the shader quality here.

number.name: Snow Quality
number.desc: Snow Quality affects the number of snowflakes. (Impact: Medium) (Value↗ FPS↘)

number.name: Blur Max Quality
number.desc: Limits the maximum number of samples for the blur effect. (Impact: Medium) (Value↗ FPS↘)

choice.name: VCR Shader
choice.desc: Adjusting the VCR quality to 'Low' will use a faster method. (Impact: Low to Moderate)

choice.name: VCR Note Shader
choice.desc: Set the VCR quality for notes to Low to use the faster method. (Impact: Low to Moderate)

checkbox.name: Mirror Wrap Transform
checkbox.desc: Disable Mirror Wrap Transform Shader (Impact: Low)
